summary: Another HI RES 2048x2048 bump map file for water...I didn\'t point out on the pictures which one is before and which one is after...chouse for yourself ;)
descriptionHtml:
Another HI RES 2048x2048 bump map file for water that i think is very realistic...why...because it has small, very small ripples thus a lots and lots of little sparkles of sun reflecting on water just like you would see in the mountain waters...at least i pictured it like that :)...
just unrar it to skyrim/Data/textures/water end ENJOY!

link for the video how it looks like...just at the end of the video...
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7hUKgQxdCPk 

OK it\'s not that original water is bad i like it but bethesda intentionally did that to cover incomplete reflection...if anybody could fix that water reflects apsolutely everything and also reflect it correctly i would be vary greatfull...

Check out my other mods:
